Deals 22.5 (15 on illusions) damage in 0.5-second intervals, starting 0.5 second after the debuff is placed.
The damage of multiple Cloaks of Flames do not stack. Only the first applied debuff applies the effects.
abilities.description: Burns enemy units for 45 damage per second. Illusions deal 30 damage per second.
